Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of The Human Meteor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the comic book and its main character, The Human Meteor, setting the stage for the story.

sub_scenes.title: Comic Book Cover Reveal
sub_scenes.description: The cover page reveals the comic title, the main character, and hints at the initial conflict and setting.

Major_Arcs.title: Duke's Taxi Service and Suspicion
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc establishes Duke's taxi driver persona and the initial events that lead him to suspect something is amiss, transitioning him towards his superhero identity.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Job for Wealthy Passengers
sub_scenes.description: Duke picks up rich playboys and takes them to the waterfront, setting the scene and introducing Duke in his civilian role.

sub_scenes.title: Rising Suspicion and Transformation
sub_scenes.description: Duke notices G-Man Holden's car and becomes suspicious, leading him to transform into the Human Meteor.

Major_Arcs.title: Initial Superhero Action and New Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc showcases Human Meteor's initial superhero actions, leading to a new mission related to a suspected Japanese submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Criminals
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts and apprehends 'cop shooters', establishing his active superhero role.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Briefing and Yacht Investigation Plan
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor gets a new mission from G-Man Holden in the hospital, involving a suspicious yacht and a Japanese submarine. Duke and Toby plan to investigate.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Infiltration and Mission Twist
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the yacht infiltration, Duke's investigation, and a major plot twist regarding Toby's true allegiance.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Crew Activities and Cabin Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Duke investigates the yacht, observing the crew and finding a depth chart, while Toby is still on board.

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Fall and Rescue - Mission Revealed
sub_scenes.description: Toby is attacked and falls overboard, leading to Duke's rescue and the revelation that Toby is working undercover with the yacht captain to investigate a submarine.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Rescue and Yacht's True Mission

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Investigation and Submarine Attack
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Duke's underwater approach, his discovery of the sunken submarine and the ongoing resupply operation, culminating in his attack on the submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Underwater Journey and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Duke approaches the yacht underwater and discovers the sunken Japanese submarine and the resupply operation.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Combat and Submarine Attack
sub_scenes.description: Duke fights divers, encounters a new diver and a tentacle monster, and then attacks the submarine with a torpedo.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with New Diver and Tentacle Attack

Major_Arcs.title: Surface Aftermath and Evidence Gathering
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with the immediate aftermath of the submarine attack, shifting to events on the ship and Duke's return to the surface to gather evidence.

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Mystery and Targeting the Ship
sub_scenes.description: Events on the ship deck involving a fallen man and a geyser, followed by Duke targeting the ship.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke Targets the Ship and Needs Air

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Discovery and Evidence Presentation
sub_scenes.description: Duke surfaces, finds the depth map on the yacht, and presents it as evidence to a naval officer.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery on the Yacht and Map Revelation

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution and Winding Down
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Human Meteor storyline, transitioning through travel, hospital visit, and ending with a domestic scene.

sub_scenes.title: Travel and Hospital Visit to Holden
sub_scenes.description: Duke and Toby travel and visit Holden in the hospital, checking on his recovery.

sub_scenes.title: Evening and Bedtime
sub_scenes.description: Duke and Toby drive home, and Toby is put to bed, concluding the day's events.

Major_Arcs.title: Boys' Adventure Begins - The Wallet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc initiates a new storyline focusing on two boys, Skip and Chuck, and their discovery of a dropped wallet, leading them into a new adventure.

sub_scenes.title: Imagined Conflict and Ambulance Observation
sub_scenes.description: An imagined dramatic scene is followed by the boys noticing an ambulance arrival.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Discovery and Decision to Return
sub_scenes.description: The boys find a dropped wallet and decide to return it to the address, initiating their adventure.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Interne Drops Wallet and Boys Investigate
Marine Salutes Civilian and Boys Inquire

Major_Arcs.title: Bus Garage Encounter and Mr. Horst
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the boys' arrival at the bus garage, their interaction with personnel, and their intimidating encounter with Mr. Horst.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Wait at the Garage
sub_scenes.description: The boys reach the bus garage, return the wallet, and are led inside to wait for Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Arrive at Bus Garage and Encounter Uniformed Man
Boys Led to Mr. Horst and Instructed to Wait

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Mr. Horst
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst confronts the boys in an intimidating manner, initiating a tense interaction.

narrative_arcs.title: Sudden Grab and Confrontation with Mr. Horst
Horst Questions Boys About Wallet Contents

Major_Arcs.title: Sinister Plot and Violent Turn
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc reveals a sinister plot involving carbon monoxide and escalates into a violent confrontation at the bus garage.

sub_scenes.title: Unveiling the Carbon Monoxide Plan
sub_scenes.description: A separate accusatory scene and a threatening order from Horst reveal a sinister plan involving carbon monoxide.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Lying in Another Room

sub_scenes.title: Violent Confrontation and Shooting
sub_scenes.description: A fight breaks out, the boys are overpowered, and Major Bronson is shot by Horst, escalating the danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight Breaks Out and Order to Stop
Man with Glasses Threatens Boys with Gun

Major_Arcs.title: Seeking Help and Uncovering Sabotage Plot
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the boys' escape and their separate paths to seek help and uncover the larger sabotage plot.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Marine Aid and Waterfront Journey
sub_scenes.description: Chuck and Skip decide to seek help. Chuck encounters a Marine Sergeant who leads him to the waterfront.

sub_scenes.title: Skip's Discovery in Secret Office
sub_scenes.description: Skip discovers sabotage plans in a secret office, uncovering the broader conspiracy.

narrative_arcs.title: Skip Discovers Sabotage Plans and Confrontation

Major_Arcs.title: Marine Intervention and Resolution of Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the Marines' response to the situation, their intervention, and the successful dismantling of the Nazi spy ring.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Alert and Car Crash Response
sub_scenes.description: Alerted at the Marine Barracks, Marines respond, crashing a car in their haste to help.

sub_scenes.title: Marines Arrive and Resolve the Conflict
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive, engage in a fight, and ultimately dismantle the Nazi spy ring, despite Major Bronson's injury.

narrative_arcs.title: Skip's Book Defense and Gun Confrontation

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry and South American Adventure Begins
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces new protagonists, Champ and Henry, and sets the stage for their South American adventure against Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Character Introduction and Setting
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Champ and Henry and the nature of their fight against Axis powers.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry

sub_scenes.title: Discovery and Initial Confrontation in South America
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are located in a South American town and are confronted by local authorities.

Major_Arcs.title: Interrogation and Kidnapping Plot Reveal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the interrogation of Champ and Henry and the revelation of President Rosita's daughter's kidnapping by El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Police Interrogation and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are interrogated by officers about their presence and knowledge of Rosita's daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Interrogation and Revelation of Rosita's Kidnapping

Major_Arcs.title: Abduction and New Allies
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc sees Champ and Henry abducted, but it turns out to be a rescue mission setup by allies connected to Rosita's mother.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Abduction and Journey
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are forcibly taken into a car, leading to a new location and encounter.

Major_Arcs.title: Hideout Infiltration and El Tigre Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the plan to infiltrate El Tigre's hideout, the execution of the plan, and the revelation of El Tigre himself.

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Entering the Hideout
sub_scenes.description: A plan is devised to infiltrate El Tigre's hideout, and the infiltration begins.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout

Major_Arcs.title: El Tigre's Capture and Axis Plot
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details El Tigre's capture, interrogation, and the revelation of Axis agents' involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Confinement of El Tigre
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre is captured and confined, setting the stage for interrogation.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Weariness and Cryptic Thought

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Axis Agent Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Search for Rosita and interrogation of El Tigre reveal Axis agents' misuse of his name and involvement.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
Interrogation about Rosita and Denial of Kidnapping

Major_Arcs.title: Rosita's Location and Rescue Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the discovery of Rosita's location and the mobilization of a rescue mission to save her.

sub_scenes.title: Demand for Explanation and News of Imprisonment
sub_scenes.description: Demand for explanation about Tigre leads to news of Rosita's imprisonment by Axis agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Explanation Regarding Tigre's Actions

sub_scenes.title: Mobilizing the Rescue Force
sub_scenes.description: Urgent call to action and resolve to rescue Rosita at any cost mobilize the rescue force.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgent Call to Action and Pursuit
Determined Resolve to Rescue Rosita at Any Cost

Major_Arcs.title: Pursuit and Rescue of Rosita
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the pursuit of Rosita's captors, the infiltration of their location, and the rescue operation.

sub_scenes.title: Horseback Pursuit and Building Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: Horseback pursuit leads to building infiltration in pursuit of Rosita's captors.

sub_scenes.title: Finding Rosita and Combat
sub_scenes.description: Rosita is found, but immediate hostility erupts, leading to combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Rosita and Immediate Hostility
Machine Gun Threat and Heroic Intervention
Government Troops and Search for Fascists

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission and Capture
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to Devil Dog Dolan's jungle mission, his combat, and subsequent capture.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Captain's Orders
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan engages in jungle combat and then reports to Captain Lawton, revealing a high-stakes situation.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Pursuit and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Pursuit into the jungle leads to an ambush and Dolan's capture.

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Interrogation and Torture
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured, interrogated, and tortured for information.

Major_Arcs.title: Dolan's Arson and Native Alliance Shift
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Dolan's act of arson, reactions to it, and a significant shift in native allegiance.

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Arson and Reactions
sub_scenes.description: Dolan admits to arson and sets fires, while reactions vary from pursuit to dismissal.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan Admits and Acts to Burn Supplies

sub_scenes.title: Dolan vs Natives and New Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan fights natives, leading to the chief's death and a shift in native allegiance towards the marine and America.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan's Surprise Attack and Fight with Natives
Natives' Homage and Gratitude to Marine

Major_Arcs.title: Captain's Decision and Service Discipline
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the Captain's difficult decision and concludes with a scene of service discipline, emphasizing duty.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma and Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Captain faces a dilemma, makes a decision, and intervenes in a confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Service Discipline
sub_scenes.description: Shore leave is rescinded, Dolan is praised, and service discipline is enforced.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Praise

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Burgess Murder Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and the initial briefing on the Robert Burgess murder case.

sub_scenes.title: Twinkle Twins Premise Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and their mission to fight ruthless killers.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and their mission

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Office Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Briefing at the Weston Call newspaper office about the Burgess murder case and suspect Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Newspaper Office Briefing on Burgess Murder
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly

Major_Arcs.title: Investigation Deepens and Reilly Pursuit
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the deepening investigation into the Burgess murder case, suspicion shifting towards Farnacci, and the pursuit of Tom Reilly.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Impressions and Racketeering Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Impressions of Miss Reilly at the hospital lead to suspicion of racketeering by Farnacci.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Inquiry to Elijah
Radio Broadcast Revelation and Reilly Pursuit

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Inquiry and Mrs. Murphy's Explanation
sub_scenes.description: Inquiries in the Irish section lead to Mrs. Murphy's explanation of Tom Reilly's situation and innocence.

narrative_arcs.title: Mrs. Murphy's Explanation of Tom Reilly's Situation

sub_scenes.title: Gunfire, Escape Attempt, and Citizen Blockade
sub_scenes.description: Sudden gunfire disrupts the scene, leading to Reilly's escape attempt and a citizen blockade.

Major_Arcs.title: Citizen Action, Police Intervention and Reilly's Recovery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Twinkle Twins story, showing citizen uprising, police intervention, and Tom Reilly's recovery thanks to community blood donation.

sub_scenes.title: Citizen Uprising and Police Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Citizen uprising subdues criminals, followed by police intervention and arrests.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Arrival and Blood Transfusion Need
Blood Type Mismatch and Community Aid
Community Responds to Blood Donation Call
Demand for Farnacci to Donate Blood and Police Action Plan
Police Confrontation and Arrest of Farnacci
Celebration of Reilly's Daughter's Recovery and Farnacci's Imprisonment
